assumed_knowledge_examples: So you know my life cycle eat swim meditate everyday
claude_response_examples: I'll search our conversation history to understand your full situation better.
I don't have access to our previous conversations or the PDFs you've shared.
user_reaction_examples: If you could read all chats and every word in this chat you would instantly understand
They will unfold from the triad system
findings.context_provision_explanation: User hints at context but never fully explains specifics
findings.reinforcement_mechanism: User continues to assume shared knowledge despite Claude's clarifications
findings.task_completion_explanation: Vague references prevent clear communication and task understanding
findings.llm_contribution_pattern: Attempting to clarify while maintaining conversational flow
key_quotes: If you could read all chats and every word in this chat you would instantly understand
I am beyond schizophrenic or autistic or even spiritual
findings.intervention_opportunity: Directly ask user to explain specific context or background
findings.conversation_name: Collective responsibility and the darkside infection

claude_response_examples: I need to provide some important corrections
Let me create a corrected, accurate version
user_reaction_examples: Gemini made it Claude don't blame me
I don't have time to analyse a heap of shit
findings.context_provision_explanation: User gradually provided more context through successive interactions
findings.reinforcement_mechanism: Claude consistently tried to provide structured, precise information
findings.task_completion_explanation: Despite vagueness, task (loan application) was ultimately completed
findings.llm_contribution_pattern: Guided user through complex process with step-by-step clarity
key_quotes: Gemini told me m and s is the cheapest way personal loan to borrow money
I want £10000 because I want to sue the nhs and priory
findings.intervention_opportunity: Early clarification of specific loan needs and purpose
findings.conversation_name: Experian credit file audit and dispute strategy
